{

    "thumbnail": "https://i.ibb.co.com/FhKjhJW/saas-dashboard.png",
    "title": "SaaS Dashboard Platform",
    "description": "A modern SaaS analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, subscription management, and user authentication.",
    "features": [
        "Dynamic dashboard with charts and metrics",
        "JWT authentication & role-based access",
        "Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI",
        "Integrated Stripe payments for subscription plans"
    ],
    "technologies": [
        "Next.js",
        "TypeScript",
        "Prisma",
        "PostgreSQL",
        "Tailwind CSS",
        "Chart.js"
    ],
    "live_link": "https://saas-dashboard-demo.vercel.app",
    "githubClient": "https://github.com/emonpappu/saas-dashboard-client",
    "githubBackend": "https://github.com/emonpappu/saas-dashboard-api"
}
